element.name: Yordle
element.description:
Yordle Ability Score Increase.Your dexterity and charisma score both increase by 1, and one other ability score increases by 1.
Age.Yordles do not have a known lifespan, for no one has lived long enough to see one die of old age nor are Yordles ones to speak about it. Centuries can pass for a Yordle without the slightest change in their youthfulness.
Alignment.Most yordles are good, but what defines them most is how they have been taught by those around them.
Size.Yordles tend to stand about 2-3 feet and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is small
Speed.Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Yordle nimbleness:You can move through the space of a creature larger than you.
Yordle knowledge:Because you have been around for so long you are aware of key parts of history where you have certain memories of places or events.
Soul and Body:yordles have a link to the spiritual world which is why when a yordles body gives in their soul continues on to find a new body and carry on.
Lucky:When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die. You must use the new result, even if it is a 1.
